Name: PieWithApples
Steps: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees. Combine 2 eggs and 200 g sugar in a bowl. Add a pinch of salt and 1 teaspoon of vanilla sugar. Whisk the mixture thoroughly. Add 50 g softened butter and stir until smooth. Add flour to a bowl, stirring constantly with a whisk. Stir the mixture well until smooth.Bake in the oven for 30-40 minutes.
